problem_names:
lemma word16_and_max_simp:
  \<open>x AND 0xFFFF = x\<close> for x :: \<open>16 word\<close>
translations:
lemma word16_and_max_simp:
  \<open>x AND 0xFFFF = x\<close> for x :: \<open>16 word\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x AND 65535 = x

proof (prove)
using this:
  x AND mask LENGTH(16) = x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x AND 65535 = x
